data.title: NND (mostly Gen 2.5!) translations — [Lyrics] Vaundy - strobo - Track 11: Bye by me
data.meta_description: [Lyrics] Vaundy - strobo - Track 11: Bye by me Listen to his album “strobo” here. Watch the music video here. Special thanks to @sailstella for translation proofing! REMINDER: Please ask me for...
data.text:
Listen to his album “strobo” here.

Watch the music video here.

Special thanks to @sailstella for translation proofing!

REMINDER: Please ask me for permission first before reposting these translations to other sites or translating into other languages. My DMs here or on Twitter are always open.

Short note about the title: I read a Youtube comment on the MV by a user named バルシャーク saying that “Bye by me” sounds like “Bye-bye (to) me“, indicating that it could mean that the narrator in the lyrics is saying good bye not just to their former lover, but also to their self from when they were together. ^ ^

Romaji and English lyrics after the cut!

Romaji:

MONDAY kyou wa

Doko e iku no?

Maa ii kedo

TUESDAY kyou mo

Oshigoto dattan desho?

Maa ii kedo

Maa ii kedo

WEDNESDAY kyou wa

Nani o mite iru no?

Tsurai desho

Mata sa

Tooku satta kako no hibi ni

Namae o tsukete itan desho

Okaeri, de mo mou ii yo

Tsutaetai koto wa toku ni nai kara

Okaeri, de mo mou ii no

Oboete iru koto wa mou nai yo

THURSDAY kyou wa

Doko ni itte kita no?

Osoi desho

FRIDAY kyou wa

Omoi dashite ita no?

Ano koto o

De mo sa

Tooku satta kako no hibi to

SAYONARA shitara raku desho

Okaeri, de mo mou ii yo

Tsutaetai koto wa toku ni nai kara

Okaeri, de mo mou ii no

Oboete iru koto wa mou nai yo

Yasumi no yoru no yakezake mo

Sore kurai ni shite

Mou ii daro

Ai shite itanda kitto

Omoi dasu koto o

Ai shite, ai shite

Mitashite iru nara

Wasurete mo, mou ii yo

Tsutaetai koto wa mou tsutaeta kara

Wasurete mo, mou ii yo

Kono saki mo ippai tamatte iku kara

Ai shite yamanai kizu mo

Naku shite atarashii hibi o

Mata ne

Bye by me

English:

It’s Monday today

Where are you going?

Not that I care

It’s Tuesday today

Didn’t you have work, too?

Not that I care

Not that I care

It’s Wednesday today

What are you looking at?

It’s difficult, isn’t it?

Then again,

Those days that we’ve left far in the past

You’ve given them a name, haven’t you?

*Welcome back, but it’s over now

Since I have nothing in particular to say to you

Welcome back, but it’s over now

The things I can recall are already gone

It’s Thursday today

Where did you come from?

Isn’t it late?

It’s Friday today

Were you reminiscing?

About what happened then

But then again,

Those days that we’ve left far in the past

It’ll be easier to say goodbye to them, don’t you think?

Welcome back, but it’s over now

Since I have nothing in particular to say to you

Welcome back, but it’s over now

The things I can recall are already gone

Drinking in desperation every night off

At least keep it that way

That’s good enough, isn’t it?

**I’m sure I loved them

Our memories that we’ve made

If I loved them, loved them

And have had enough of them

Even if I forget, it’s okay now

Since I’ve already said what I wanted to say to you

Even if I forget, it’s okay now

Since I’ll gather more memories from now on anyway

I’ll get rid of the wounds I couldn’t stop loving, too

And make brand new days

See you soon,

Bye by me.

Translation notes:

* can also be interpreted as “Saying ‘Welcome back’ won’t be necessary anymore“
